Reviews.Title: VS240HD needs few tweaks, Seller horrible
Reviews.Author: KPC
Reviews.Content: Surveillance station easy to setup for local access/monitoring.Surveillance station not intuitive to setup for internet access- recommended routers on list are no longer available, so EZInternet setup useless (for notifications, remote access, etc. all manual- without useful instructions in user manual).Seller promised shipping in 5-7 days- received four weeks later.  Shipping label printed but not put in shipping channels.  When asked for expedited shipping after 2.5 weeks (and item still hadn't left warehouse), response received two days later that item was already in shipping channels (but tracking says dropped off same day I received email response).  Seller did nothing to correct their shipping error nor acknowledge they had made a mistake.
